member.name: T:UserAccount.Plugin.AccountSettings
member.summary: Settings that affect how the UserAccount.Plugin module is used and configured.

member.name: P:UserAccount.Plugin.AccountSettings.ShowOrders
member.summary: Determines whether orders are shown within the website.

member.name: P:UserAccount.Plugin.AccountSettings.ShowInvoices
member.summary: Detemines whether invoices are shown within the website.

member.name: P:UserAccount.Plugin.AccountSettings.ShowCreditCards
member.summary:
Show credit cards.
If you show credit cards you must never storethe credit card number or other details that could be used by hackers.
As well as breaking a number of privacy rules it will leave you open to potential law suits. Instead store tokenized card details that are encrypted.

member.name: P:UserAccount.Plugin.AccountSettings.ShowBillingAddress
member.summary: Show billing address, if you take payments.

member.name: P:UserAccount.Plugin.AccountSettings.ShowDeliveryAddress
member.summary: Show delivery addresses if you deliver physical products.

member.name: P:UserAccount.Plugin.AccountSettings.ShowMarketingPreferences
member.summary: Show marketing preferences for the user.

member.name: P:UserAccount.Plugin.AccountSettings.ShowLicences
member.summary: Shows the licences that are owned by the user.

member.name: P:UserAccount.Plugin.AccountSettings.ShowSupportTickets
member.summary: Show support tickets that the user has created.

member.name: P:UserAccount.Plugin.AccountSettings.ShowAppointments
member.summary: Show appointments made by the user, if your website supports appointments.

member.name: P:UserAccount.Plugin.AccountSettings.ShowDownloads
member.summary: Show the downloads section, contains items the user has downloaded.

member.name: P:UserAccount.Plugin.AccountSettings.ShowBlog
member.summary: If Blog.Plugin module is loaded, this will show an icon for the user to view their own blogs.

member.name: P:UserAccount.Plugin.AccountSettings.PasswordUppercaseCharCount
member.summary:
Minimum number of upper case characters that have to be in a password.
Default: 1 Minimum: 0 Maximum: 3

member.name: P:UserAccount.Plugin.AccountSettings.PasswordLowercaseCharCount
member.summary:
Minimum number of lower case characters that have to be in a password.
Default: 1 Minimum: 0 Maximum: 3

member.name: P:UserAccount.Plugin.AccountSettings.PasswordNumberCharCount
member.summary:
Minimum number of numbers that must appear within a password.
Default: 1 Minimum: 0 Maximum: 3

member.name: P:UserAccount.Plugin.AccountSettings.PasswordSpecialCharCount
member.summary:
Minimum number of special characters that must appear within a password.
Default: 1 Minimum: 0 Maximum: 3

member.name: P:UserAccount.Plugin.AccountSettings.PasswordSpecialCharacters
member.summary:
Special password characters that can be used for login password.
Default: Â£$^*()#,.<>?:;!@

member.name: T:UserAccount.Plugin.PluginInitialisation
member.summary: Implements IPlugin and IPluginVersion which allows the UserAccount.Plugin module to be loaded as a plugin module
